description:
Welcome to the course on “How to cut your expenses by 50%”. You might be wondering if this is the right course for me. Let me help you there -- I made this course to teach people on how to save money on their daily spending, reduce credit card debt, and how to allocate funds in retirement accounts and also relieve credit card debt. You are someone who wants to save money and reduce your debt and this course will help you get there

In this course, I cover personal finance management basics and step by step guide to saving money. The course also teaches budget tracking and finance management and helps track you income and expenses.

The course covers saving money in all facets of life starting from your daily expenses like shopping, grocery and entertainment expenses. Then I help you balance your budget with a free budget balance tool. I also show you free apps that will help you balance the budget. We also the look at your retirement savings accounts, employer matching and reduce the fees you pay for these accounts. Overall this course will help save money in different areas and you will find that the combined savings will be close to 50% of your income.

The course feature multiple lessons on saving money along with short quiz in some sections. The course also includes a free budget tracker template for download and we also walkthrough the steps to use the template to track your income and expenses. If you follow the course completely then you can fully understand utilize the concepts in your life to save money. The only prerequisite for this course is the desire and motivation to save money. Start this course today and apply these concepts tomorrow
title: Step-by-Step Guide to Cutting Monthly Expenses
instructors: Udemy Instructor Rajesh Krishnan, Udemy Instructor Sudha Surendiranath
